description: Modifies the capacity reservation of the specified load balancer. When modifying capacity reservation, you must include at least one MinimumLoadBalancerCapacity or ResetCapacityReservation.

parameters.name: LoadBalancerArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the load balancer.

parameters.name: MinimumLoadBalancerCapacity
parameters.description: The minimum load balancer capacity reserved. CapacityUnits (integer) --- The number of capacity units.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The last time the capacity reservation was modified.

nested_items.name: DecreaseRequestsRemaining
nested_items.description: The amount of daily capacity decreases remaining.

nested_items.name: MinimumLoadBalancerCapacity
nested_items.description: The requested minimum capacity reservation for the load balancer.

nested_items.name: CapacityReservationState
nested_items.description: The state of the capacity reservation.

nested_items.name: Reason
nested_items.description: The reason code for the status.

nested_items.name: EffectiveCapacityUnits
nested_items.description: The number of effective capacity units.
